Posts.Content: Has I had a nipple sparing skin sparing double mastectomy and immediate reconstruction using implants on Thursday 10th may... I had four drains still have 3. Two are draining under 50ml one (placed near the implant) is still draining 50ml... im desperate to go home I'm not in any pain. But the surgeons are advising against it as the drain near the implant is still draining to much fluid...I asked if I can not just empty it but they said no because of the 'risk of infection' which could result in having to remove my implants . Anyone else had this problem???
Posts.Title: Preventative double mastectomy immediate reconstruction using implants...

Posts.Content: Hiya ...so 30 mins later to my moany paragraph two surgeons said I could have all drains removed and go home! I was so happy!! Now the dreaded removal of the drains..when my first was removed I have plenty of fentanyl in my system so wasn't to bad. Just can't wait to get into my own bed I'm sick of waking up with a stinky sweaty back From these hospital bedsÂ
Posts.Title: Preventative double mastectomy immediate reconstruction using implants...
